item.description:
For all those who have nothing to do this Labor Day weekend. Come join us at Captain's Cove, our tiny slice of summertime heaven, as we dance the afternoon away to the awesome sounds of "SHORT BUS"!

That's right, SHORT BUS! This band is amazing! VOTED THREE TIME WINNER "BEST COVER BAND" BY THE READERS OF FAIRFIELD WEEKLY MAGAZINE AND BY GREENWICH, DARIEN, NEW CANAAN & WESTPORT MAGAZINES! THE FIRST BAND THAT HAS EVER WON BOTH AWARDS!!! I guarantee they will get you off you off your seat and on the deck! The boardwalk will feel like a trampoline with all the energy they generate

The SHORT BUS is Chris Goane, Mark Zelenz, Ernie Albert, Kenny Muller, and some guy named Chuck! - Their goal is to get you up and dancing to Maximum Rock & Roll! That's why they're Fairfield County's most rippin' rock dance band! Click on the links to see photos, listen to their demos and watch their videos, THEY WILL MAKE YOU HAPPY!

Take a peek at the SHORT BUS

PLEASE GET THERE EARLY TO HELP US HOLD DOWN THE PICNIC TABLES (you can also bring a lawn chair)! THIS IS A POPULAR BAND SO THE JOINT WILL BE JUMPING! ALSO IF YOU GET THERE EARLY IT'S A GREAT WAY TO MEET & MINGLE WITH EVERYONE BEFORE THE MUSIC STARTS BECAUSE ONCE THAT HAPPENS, MOST OF US WILL BE ON THE DECK, DANCING!!!!

Take a look at CAPTAIN'S COVE
item.how_to_find_us: Would someone like to be the contact person? I'm not sure I can be there.

group.name: PartyExpress !! Let's Get Together and have Fun!

item.name: Short Bus @ Captian's cove
